page.title: 07Farming
page.content: The farms are mainly livestock.The main crop is grass. The fields have limestone walls. The main breeds of cattle here, are Herefords and Freisians.Suffolk and Clun are the main breeds of sheep, others are Sussex and Leicester. {A Farming Calendar} {January}Feeding cattle and milking. {February}Mucking out and milking. {March} Start lambing,feed cattle. {April} Lambing and repairing walls. {May} Turn cattle into fields.{ {June }Sheep shearing,start silaging. {July} Haymaking and dipping sheep. {August} Finish haymaking, second crop. {September}Sheep dipping,marking lambs. {October }Repair walls. {November }Milking cows go inside. {December }Young stock inside, muck fields.
